summary: The future tag encompasses resources that explore innovative concepts around decentralized systems, ecosystem architecture, and regenerative practices. These resources delve into the fragmentation of the internet, advocating for decentralized, sustainable, and proactive future networks that transcend traditional boundaries of space and time. Topics include transforming broken systems, reclaiming control from 'Surveillance Capitalism,' and investing in desired futures rather than adhering to expected ones.
excerpt: Ecosystem architecture pushes us to invest in desired futures over expected ones. Reclaiming the decentralized internet from 'Surveillance Capitalism' demands proactive alignment and alternative futures.
